Title: Dice Rules
Writer: Andrew Dice Clay (story), Lenny Schulman (screenplay), Andrew Dice Clay
Actors: Andrew Dice Clay, Eddie Griffin, Sylvia Harman, Lee Lawrence
Plot: Before he was The Diceman, he was a poor, pathetic, put-upon Jew from New York who was disrespected by everyone he came across. Everyone. Then - he got the studded vanity leather jacket--...
